mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS a_id, a.emp_id AS a_emp_id, a.work_date AS a_work_date, a.check_in AS a_check_in, a.check_out AS a_check_out, a.status AS a_status, a.overtime_minutes AS a_overtime_minutes, e.id AS e_id, e.name AS e_name, e.email AS e_email FROM ATTENDANCE a JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON e.id = a.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId} AND a.work_date BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to} ORDER BY a.work_date ASC
